item.title: LOUDNESS - SOLDIER OF FORTUNE
item.description:
Yeah

woo wow wo

tracks to burn

we belong

Through the light of

a million eyes we know

With steel and fire

break the chain

of a hurricane

This innocent child

is no more

Together for ever oh

let’s rock the earth

no more

Soldier of fortune

giving you no warning

The whole world’s

watching let it rock

burning up the torches

We are the rebels

let it rock

oh yeah

broken dreams

we’ll find means

never look down

beyond the stars
